## Cargar bibliotecas

```{r carga librerias, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(raster)
library(dplyr)
library(spData)
library(leaflet)
library(plotly)
library(DT)
```

## Cargar documentos 
```{r carga doc}
prim <-
  st_read(
    "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gf0604-procesamientodatosgeograficos/2021i-datos/main/gbif/primates-cr-registros.csv",
    na.strings = "",
    quiet = TRUE
  )
```
## Tabla de primates avistados en Costa Rica
```{r tabla primates}
prim %>%
  select(family,
         species,
         stateProvince,
         eventDate) %>%
  DT::datatable(
    colnames = c("Familia", "Especie", "Provincia", "Fecha"),
    rownames = FALSE,
    options = list(searchHighlight = TRUE)
  )
```
